title: XDM Business Campaign workflow

xdm:campaignStartDate.title: Campaign Start date time
xdm:campaignStartDate.description: The date and time when the campaign started

xdm:campaignEndDate.title: Campaign End date time
xdm:campaignEndDate.description: The date and time by which the campaign should end

xdm:timezoneName.title: Timezone Name
xdm:timezoneName.description: Name of the timezone 'Pacific Time','Eastern time' etc.

xdm:campaignProgram.title: Campaign's Program
xdm:campaignProgram.description: The ID and the type of the program with which the campaign is associated, eg, 'Tradeshow'->'Event'

xdm:ID.title: Program ID
xdm:ID.description: Program ID associated with the Campaign

xdm:type.title: Program Type
xdm:type.description: Program's Type of the Program ID

xdm:sourceType.title: Campaign Source Type
xdm:sourceType.description: The upstream source from where the campaign record has been syncronized

xdm:campaignStatus.title: Campaign Status
xdm:campaignStatus.description: Current Status of the campaign. eg. 'Active','Disabled' etc.

xdm:isDeleted.title: Campaign soft delete status
xdm:isDeleted.description: A boolean flag which indicates whether the campaign is soft deleted in the system

xdm:isActive.title: Campaign Active status
xdm:isActive.description: A flag to indicate if the campaign is currently in the running/completed state

xdm:budgetedCost.title: Budgeted Cost
xdm:budgetedCost.description: Cost for which the campaign has been budgeted

xdm:actualCost.title: Actual cost
xdm:actualCost.description: Actual cost spent for the campaign

xdm:webinarSession.title: Webinar details
xdm:webinarSession.description: Webinar details captured if the campaign type is Webinar

xdm:ID.title: Webinar session ID
xdm:ID.description: Detail description of the Webinar session.

xdm:description.title: Webinar detail description
xdm:description.description: Detail description of the Webinar session

xdm:expectedParticipation.title: Expected Participation
xdm:expectedParticipation.description: Metrics expected out of this campaign

xdm:numberOfResponses.title: Responses expected
xdm:numberOfResponses.description: Capture how many responses are expected for this campaign

xdm:participation.title: Campaign participation
xdm:participation.description: Capture metrics related to what actually happenedfor the campaign

xdm:numberOfRequestsSent.title: Number of Requests sent
xdm:numberOfRequestsSent.description: Number of requests sent to persons for participation

xdm:numberOfResponses.title: Recieved Responses
xdm:numberOfResponses.description: Number of responses recieved out of number of requests sent

xdm:numberOfLeads.title: Number of leads
xdm:numberOfLeads.description: Number of leads to whom the requests have sent

xdm:numberOfConvertedLeads.title: Converted Leads
xdm:numberOfConvertedLeads.description: Number to indicate that how many leads got converted by this campaign

xdm:numberOfContacts.title: Number of Contacts
xdm:numberOfContacts.description: Number to indicate that the request was sent to how many contacts

xdm:opportunity.title: Opportunity details for the campaign
xdm:opportunity.description: Opportunity related metrics captured for the campaign

xdm:numberOfOpportunities.title: Number of Opportunities
xdm:numberOfOpportunities.description: Total number of opportunities associated with the campaign

xdm:amountOfAllOpportunities.title: Amount for all opportunities
xdm:amountOfAllOpportunities.description: Sum amount associated with all opportunities

xdm:amountOFWonOpportunities.title: Amount of Won Opportunities
xdm:amountOFWonOpportunities.description: Sum amount of the converted opportunities

xdm:hierarchy.title: Hierarcy Metrics captured
xdm:hierarchy.description: Metrics captured at each hierarchy of the campaign, provided there are sub-campaigns

xdm:budgetedCost.title: Budgeted cost
xdm:budgetedCost.description: Cost for which the Campaign has been budgeted for

xdm:actualCost.title: Actual Cost
xdm:actualCost.description: Actual cost spent for the campaign

xdm:numberOfRequestsSent.title: Number of Requests sent
xdm:numberOfRequestsSent.description: Number of Requests sent to participants at each level

xdm:numberOfResponses.title: Number of responses
xdm:numberOfResponses.description: Number of responses recieved by the participants at each level of the hierarchy

xdm:numberOfLeads.title: Number of leads
xdm:numberOfLeads.description: Number of leads to whom the requests have sent

xdm:numberOfConvertedLeads.title: Converted Leads
xdm:numberOfConvertedLeads.description: Number to indicate that how many leads got converted by this campaign

xdm:numberOfContacts.title: Number of Contacts
xdm:numberOfContacts.description: Number to indicate that the request was sent to how many contacts

xdm:numberOfOpportunities.title: Number of Opportunities
xdm:numberOfOpportunities.description: Total number of opportunities associated with the campaign

xdm:amountOfAllOpportunities.title: Amount for all opportunities
xdm:amountOfAllOpportunities.description: Sum amount associated with all opportunities

xdm:amountOFWonOpportunities.title: Amount of Won Opportunities
xdm:amountOFWonOpportunities.description: Sum amount of the converted opportunities
